verbose_text: Briefly, upon light irradiation, the preloaded lysosomal PS causes lysomal disruption, dispersion of lysosomal proteases throughout cytosol, mitochondrial membrane potential damage, release of cytochrome-c, and activation of downstream caspases (caspase-9 and caspase-3), which eventually results in an apoptotic morphotype XREF_BIBR.
evidence: PS causes lysomal disruption, dispersion of lysosomal proteases
